# WordCamp Ann Arbor Badges

This plugin provides a widget to render WordCamp support badges.

**Contributors:** [topher1kenobe](http://profiles.wordpress.org/topher1kenobe)  
**Tags:** [widget](http://wordpress.org/plugins/tags/widget), [wordcamp](http://wordpress.org/plugins/tags/wordcamp)  
**Requires at least:** 3.0  
**Tested up to:** 3.9.2  
**Stable tag:** 1.0  
**License:** [GPLv2 or later](http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html)  

## Description ##

This plugin provides a widget to render WordCamp support badges.  It offers the images shown at <a href="http://2014.annarbor.wordcamp.org/2014/08/19/wordcamp-ann-arbor-badges/">http://2014.annarbor.wordcamp.org/2014/08/19/wordcamp-ann-arbor-badges/</a>

## Installation ##

1. Upload `plugin-name.php` to the `/wp-content/plugins/` directory
1. Activate the plugin through the 'Plugins' menu in WordPress
1. Place `<?php do_action('plugin_name_hook'); ?>` in your templates
